profileComparison.content:
- Strong contrast split: bold text on left, clear image on right grabs attention.
- Prominent title and artist name (Rick Astley) for instant recognition.
- Nostalgic, familiar image (Never Gonna Give You Up) taps curiosity.
- Simple, uncluttered layout with a clear focal point (singer at mic).
- “4K” badge signals high quality.

batchResults.title: Rick Astley - Never Gonna Give You Up (Official Video) (4K Remaster)
batchResults.analysis: Clear, bold typography with a high-contrast split layout that emphasizes both the artist name and the iconic front-and-center shot.

batchResults.title: Disney’s Frozen On Ice – Entire Show Highlights
batchResults.analysis: Catchy text layout with bold, high-contrast colors and a smiling close-up to instantly convey excitement and theme.

batchResults.title: I Salvaged a Giant Wooden Table from Disaster and Found HIDDEN DANGERS
batchResults.analysis: Intense close-up action cropping of the vividly carved orange table pieces with workers inspecting, highlighting danger and discovery.
